Contact.subheading: Your message will be heard on the throne

FAQ.subheading: Check out the most frequently asked questions

question1.question: What is a paste?
question1.answer: Paste arrived in Mexico in the 19th century with English miners in Hidalgo. Gastronomically, it is a baked preparation of wheat dough, traditionally filled with potato and meat. Over time, it was Mexicanized with ingredients such as beans or mole. Today it is a culinary symbol of Hidalgo.

question2.question: How can I get an invoice?
question2.answer: You can request your invoice by sending us a WhatsApp message with your purchase receipt or through our website.

question3.question: What types and flavors do you offer?
question3.answer: We offer savory pastes such as potato with meat and green mole, as well as sweet options.

question4.question: What are your business hours?
question4.answer: We are available Monday through Friday from 11:00 a.m. to 8:00 p.m. and weekends from 11:00 a.m. to 7:30 p.m. We look forward to seeing you!

question5.question: Where are you located?
question5.answer: We are located at Pasillo Tec, Tecnol칩gico, 64700 Monterrey, N.L.

question6.question: How can I become a distributor of El Rey del Paste?
question6.answer: Contact us via WhatsApp or social media to learn about the requirements and benefits of becoming a distributor.
